pages.title: DOULAS by the BAY | SF Bay Area Doula Support Services

sections.h1: Are you worried about navigating pregnancy, birth, and the initial weeks with your newborn?
sections.content:
[Contact Us](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/contact/)
[0 Items](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/courses-cart/)
Expecting families often navigate a sea of emotions, with anticipation and concerns about birth, labor, and the postpartum period. Our Doulas are dedicated to alleviating these concerns, providing support and guidance every step of the way.
Our mission is to provide peace of mind, empowering you to embark on this journey with confidence. Our meticulous attention to detail, extensive experience, and unwavering commitment to families have established Doulas by the Bay as the premier and most trusted doula practice in both Northern and Southern California.
![](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Fertility-Benefits-Payment-Plans-website.png)
[Contact Us](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/contact/)
![Baby & Mom Doula Care](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/mom-and-baby-transparent-smaller-white-outline.png)

sections.title: Our Doula Services
sections.content:
We are a team of Birth, Postpartum Doulas and Newborn Care Specialists who are dedicated to supporting families before, during and immediately after childbirth.
[view all services](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/services/)
![Postpartum Support Doula](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/postpartum-support-icon-greenbackground.jpg)
#### Postpartum Support
Our Postpartum Doulas and Newborn Care Specialists work with couples and single parents to identify what type of support they need.
[Learn More](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/services/postpartum-doula/)
![Birth Support Doula](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/birth-support-icon-greenbackground.jpg)
#### Birth Support
Our Birth Doulas remain current in evidence-based practices & work hard to protect & support each couple or single parent’s desires for birth.
[Learn More](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/services/birth-doula/)
[![Sibling Support](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/sibling-support-icon-greenbackground.jpg)](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/services/sibling-support/)
#### [Sibling Support](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/services/sibling-support/)
Our sibling support is available to care for older brothers and sisters while their parents are focused on bringing the new baby into the world.
[Learn More](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/services/sibling-support/)

sections.title: Proudly Serving the San Francisco Bay Area Since 2009
sections.content:
What makes Doulas by the Bay unique is our large, diverse team that has worked with thousands of parents and babies. Our team of professionals is trained and certified, fully Vetted, CPR certified, has Clear Background Screening, Bonded, Insured and have attended the company’s occupational Health and Safety Training. We also invest in our team’s continual professional education by offering monthly educational meetings.
### Vision Statement
Doulas By The Bay’s vision is to offer exceptional [doula services](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/services/) to families, while also empowering them with [knowledge](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/pregnancy-postpartum-live/) through the provision of evidence-based educational resources. Our aim is to help families feel confident throughout their pregnancy journey, postpartum journey, and beyond.
### Our Commitments to Parents:
- Connecting them with highly skilled professionals
- Offering parenting education & resources
- Top-notch customer service
- Providing comfort and peace of mind
[Meet Our Doulas](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/about/doulas/)
![Shakila Marando, Founder of DOULAS by the BAY](https://www.doulasbythebay.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/shakila.png)
#### Shakila Marando
Founder of DOULAS by the BAY
_Certified Birth & Postpartum Doula, Lactation Counselor & Certified Lactation Educator(CLE), DOULAS by the BAY Postpartum Doula Educator, New Parent Educator, Trained Infant Massage Educator, a Parent Coach and Infant Sleep Consultant._

sections.title: About Us
sections.content: DOULAS by the BAY is a collective of Birth and Postpartum Doulas and Newborn Care Specialists who are dedicated to supporting families before, during and immediately after the birth of their baby. We accept the following payments: HSA/FSA, Insurance, Fertility Payments (Carrot, etc.)

sections.title: Vision Statement
sections.content: Doulas By The Bay’s vision is to offer exceptional doula services to families, while also empowering them with knowledge through the provision of evidence-based educational resources. Our aim is to help families feel confident throughout their pregnancy journey, postpartum journey, and beyond.

pages.title: Foundations of a Healthy Pregnancy & Birth | DOULAS by the BAY

sections.h1: Foundations of a Healthy Pregnancy & Birth

sections.title: LED BY A LABOR AND DELIVERY NURSE
sections.content: Learn about fetal development, prenatal care, choosing the right practitioner and doula, and recognizing warning signs for a safer, healthier journey.

sections.title: Topics Covered in the Class:
sections.content:
-  Understanding fetal development.
-  Choosing healthcare practitioners.
- Navigating prenatal care visits.
- Finding the right doula.
- Recognizing pregnancy warning signs.
**And much more!**
$175.00
